basic.color: Flower color yellow, flower color yellow, fruit color yellow white outside

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 6.5
maintenance.sunlight: High quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: No need to apply extra fertilizer before fruiting
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
